product_name: 686 Dickies Insulated Overall Bib Pants - Boys'
long_description: 686 Dickies Bib Overall insulated pants celebrate hammer-swinging style while wrapping hard-playing, snow-charging boys in cozy warmth and a reliably waterproof, breathable barrier. Rugged polyester shell with INFIDRY-10(TM) waterproof, breathable coating and taped critical seams blocks rain and snow. 80g polyester insulation traps heat for all-day warmth. Smooth nylon taffeta and soft polyester tricot lining add extra comfort and ease layering. Articulated knees and partially elasticized waistband help ensure long-lasting comfort. Youth Evolution system allows extension of pant legs 1.5 in. as your child grows. Adjustable shoulder straps; handwarmer pockets; chest pocket.
short_description: 686 Dickies Bib Overall insulated pants celebrate hammer-swinging style while wrapping hard-playing, snow-charging boys in cozy warmth and a reliably waterproof, breathable barrier.
